en-US.quitTitle: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO QUIT?
en-US.quitOnReplay:
ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO RESTART? 
 YOU'LL LOSE A LIFE.
en-US.tutorialStep_01_Text_Desktop:
CLICK IN THE DIRECTION YOU 
 WANT TO SHOOT BALLOONS
en-US.tutorialStep_01_Text_Mobile:
TAP IN THE DIRECTION YOU 
 WANT TO SHOOT BALLOONS
en-US.tutorialStep_02_Text:
MAKE COMBINATIONS OF 3 OR 
 MORE BALLOONS TO CLEAR IT
en-US.tutorialStep_03_Text_Desktop:
CLICK THE CHARACTER 
 TO SWAP BALLOONS
en-US.tutorialStep_03_Text_Mobile:
TAP THE CHARACTER 
 TO SWAP BALLOONS
en-US.tutorialStep_04_Text:
DON'T LET BALLOONS FALL INTO 
 THE SEWERS OR YOU WILL LOSE!
en-US.tutorialStep_05_Text:
YOU HAVE TO POP ALL 
 THE BALLOONS TO WIN!
